Method/Endpoint: 2. Authentication is done via cookies stored in auth.json file
3. Rate limiting is automatically handled by the session manager
4. All operations are asynchronous for better performance
5. Media URLs returned may require additional authentication to download
6. The API is read-only except for: sending messages
